strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Digital Garden' theme in a cozy pixel art style perfectly bridges the gap between technical changes (endpoints, models) and our organic brand identity. The 'NomNom' model naturally lends itself to a cute character metaphor, while 'Klein' represents speed and precision. The retro game UI for the changelog taps into developer nostalgia.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art title screen. A wooden signpost in a lush digital garden that reads 'GARDEN UPDATE'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) grass and pastel lavender sky gradient. Chunky retro sprites of pixel flowers blooming. Warm sunlight rays. Lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic and welcoming.
images.description: Title card establishing the cozy garden theme.

images.prompt: A cute 8-bit pixel art creature named 'NomNom' (looks like a small round robot with bunny ears) eating a glowing data-leaf. Soft pastel background. The creature is sitting on a lime green (#ecf874) pixel cushion. Text in pixel font above: 'NomNom Alpha'. Cozy, warm lighting, chunky pixels. Represents the new web research model.
images.description: Introducing the NomNom web research model as a cute character.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art scene of a tiny artist bee painting a canvas very fast. The canvas shows a glowing blue abstract shape. Represents 'Klein' fast image generation. Sparkles and speed lines in chunky pixels. Soft peach and mint gradient background. Lime green (#ecf874) accents on the bee. Text: 'Klein is Live'.
images.description: Visualizing the Klein model update - fast and artistic.

images.prompt: Retro RPG game inventory menu UI. Pixelated scroll graphic on a dark purple background. List of items in pixel font: 'NomNom Web Search', 'Klein Fast Gen', 'Bug Squashing'. A lime green (#ecf874) cursor selects the first item. Cozy lo-fi UI aesthetic.
images.description: A summary of the technical updates presented as a game inventory.

caption:

alt_text: A carousel of cozy 8-bit pixel art images. 1. A garden sign saying Garden Update. 2. A cute pixel robot named NomNom eating a leaf. 3. A pixel bee painting a canvas for the Klein update. 4. A retro game inventory screen listing the patch notes.
